system.descriptionText: Once per Combat Encounter, whilst in Multi-Passenger vehicle with Servitor Comrade, Character makes +0 Tech-Use Test. If successful can either Increase Vehicle Manoeuvrability by +5 per Degree of Success, or increase damage of one Vehicle weapon by +1 per Degree of Success. These effects last for Intelligence Bonus Rounds.
